Title: A Soap
Writer: Kim Fupz Aakeson, Pernille Fischer Christensen
Actors: Trine Dyrholm, David Dencik, Frank Thiel, Elsebeth Steentoft
Plot: 32 year old Charlotte (Trine Dyrholm) could have it all, but she doesn't want it. After moving out of her boyfriend's apartment, she becomes the upstairs neighbor of Veronica (David Dencik), who is in the process of transitioning from male to female.
